roleset.name: feed a fire
roleset.note: STOKE-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. No VNcls. (from stoke.01-v)

example.name: fire, passive
example.text: Even before those moves added fuel, [the fires of discontent]-1 had been well stoked *trace*-1 by the highly publicized experience in Japan of one U.S. investor, T. Boone Pickens Jr.
example.arg: by the highly publicized experience in Japan of one U.S. investor, T. Boone Pickens Jr

example.name: not fire, active
example.text: Some observers thought that after Friday's sharp drop, [the firms]-1 would rein in their program traders [*-1]-2 to avoid [*-2] stoking more controversy.

roleset.name: excited, amped up
roleset.note: STOKED-J NOTES: Added by julia based on SMS. Relation to 'stoke.01' (from stoked.01-j)
